name: Stoink: Extreme QA
description:
Stoink is a simple Dwarf with a simple lifestyle. 

Stoink wakes up for breakfast at 6 am. He likes to make himself eggs and coffee in the morning. Dwarven cheese is his favorite type of cheese. He enjoys cheese with his eggs. After breakfast, Stoink LOVES to shampoo his beard, it gets all the food out of it. Gotta look professionnal for work!

Stoink enjoys walking to work. Work makes him happy. Stoink is a Disposable Employee Trap System QA. This means that his job is very important! 

Stoink rarely has lunch, because he is usually dead by noon. He doesn't mind! The clerics know Stoink really well! He is the only Dwarf to have been raised so many times without any (major) health repercussions. This is why Stoink has a good price on his Life Insurance.

Want Stoink to have lunch? Help him navigate the very dangerous dungeons and reach the exit. Remember to pick up gold along the way! Someone's gotta pay that Resurrection Tab one day!

Today is Pizza Day, Stoink would love it if he could make it to lunch!

Gameplay

Navigate a trap filled maze with limited time. Your goal is to reach the bottom of the maze with the most money!

Controls PC:
  • WASD to move 
  • E to place a bomb 
  • Esc to go back to the menu
Android:

Joypad and buttons are on screen!
